title: tour: Ctrl+PgUP issue, conflict with tab switching in Chrome
body:
On tab switching wing Ctrl+PgUp in Chrome Playground switches pages

### Context

  * Linux Mint 17 x64
  * browser Chrome v43
  * 2+ tabs in chrome
  * first tab: https://tour.golang.org/concurrency/3

### Setps

  * open second tab
  * press Ctrl+PgUp

### Expected

  * playground page: https://tour.golang.org/concurrency/3

### Actual

  * playground page: https://tour.golang.org/concurrency/2

### Vice versa

Same bug for Ctrl+PgDown case when playgroud is second tab and switching from first tab to second
